channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep pothole, 19th January
item.description:
Deep pothole in the middle of the cycle lane going north onto Holloway Road. There is traffic on both side so it is hard to go around. When this hole opened up a few years ago I had a accident here.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 154, Canonbury Road, Highbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep holes all along Westbourne Road, 19th January
item.description:
Deep and sharp edged potholes along Westbourne Road, this is a busy route for parents taking their kids to school on bicycles because Mary Magdalen school is on one end and Thornhill primary school on the other.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Arundel Square, Barnsbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog waste bags strewn across pavement, 19th January
item.description:
Despite a message to say this had been resolved, it hasnâ€™t been. There are still piles of dog waste bags on the pavement and road being trodden into surrounding paths. It has not been resolved and on a school route, is an eyesore and health issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farquhar Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and old tiles dumped on grass verge, 19th January

item.title: Huge spray tag on shop shutters, 19th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Green Lane, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Thorndale house communal door not closing, 19th January
item.description:
Thorndale house communal door not closing, cause homeless and drugs adect sleep over night in the staircase, the contracter didn't fix the door properly if lasted couple hours we were expecting them to comeback but they never came back.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Manor Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Grass growing on the pavement, 19th January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oldfield Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Litter and bike battery on lawn, 19th January
item.description:
Generally this area gets a lot of litter and needs regular attention. Right now, there is the ripped off battery from a lime bike just by the wall, along with other litter, chemicals can be leaking into the ground or even as a fire hazard from the lithium.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Laurel Street, Hackney, London
